main.heading: Ignatio Ferreira
main.bio: Hi, I'm a student in South Africa currently studying at Belgium Campus ITVersity and working full time as a DevOps engineer at Sybrin. I want to use my career to make cool things and meet awesome people. In my free time, I paint, make sounds on instruments and workout. My three favorite people are Jordan Peterson, Elon Musk and Lex Fridman. Thank you for visiting my website!

description: Gained exposure to SQL, Javascript, Java, C#, GIT, HTML & CSS and project management, academic writing, innovation and leadership.

Selected to participate in international exchange program with 5 other students. Worked with Llieda, PXL, Fontys and FHOO University. Studied UX, AI, Cyber Security, Data Science and IoT. Stayed in Spain, Belgium and the Netherlands.
Received subject prize for IT with 91%.

work.title: Graduate DevOps Engineer
description: Maintained CI/CD infrastructure, e.g., Modified and created Jenkins jobs, deployed applicationsto Kubernetes and Dockerized applications.
Maintained SQL databases, e.g., Moved databases, cleaned databases, reclaimed space and rebuiltindexes.
Gained exposure to SQL, C#, Git, Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Azure, Nginx, IIS, Powershell andBash.
Hardened environments, e.g., Renewed SSL certificates, added headers and ran security scans.
Developed software, e.g., Fixed bugs and added features (in C#, WPF and Powershell).
Administered GIT & SVN, e.g., Provided access and created repositories.
Automated things in Python and Shell.

projects.title: Weather WebApp
projects.category: Created a resume website with React and hosted it on Google Cloud Platform’s App Engine. Used Javascript and CSS.

projects.title: Spotify-Twitter CLI App
projects.category: Created a CLI application that uses the Spotify, Twitter and OMDB APIs to retrieve song details, tweets and movie details. Made with Javascript, Nodejs and love.

projects.title: Sorting Visualizer
projects.category: Created a bubble sort visualizer with React and hosted it on GitHub Pages.

projects.title: Resume Website
projects.category: Created a resume website with React and hosted it on Google Cloud Platform’s App Engine. Used Javascript and CSS.
